basic_training_chapter1_welcome_modal_me: To begin, please note that in the upper-right corner of this notification there is an icon . By clicking on it, the notification will collapse, freeing the entire screen for interaction and completing tasks. Click the icon to collapse the notification. After that, expand it again by clicking the icon that appears in the lower-left corner of the screen.
basic_training_chapter1_welcome_chapter_: Our city has catteries and pet shops. Catteries breed and raise kittens. Pet shops actively trade with catteries and with city residents. Everyone wants to make a profit!
basic_training_chapter1_main_menu_messag: You can do it too! Let’s take a look at the main menu at the top of the screen.
basic_training_chapter1_coins_expenses_m: Here you can see how much you spent and earned per turn (balance).
basic_training_chapter1_additional_menu_: This button helps you navigate the game. Click it to learn more.
basic_training_chapter1_start_params_mes: The first item is the starting parameters. Here you can view information about the current session.
basic_training_chapter1_task_goal_messag: The «Task goal» button reminds you what needs to be done to complete the chapter.
basic_training_chapter1_restart_task_mes: The «Restart task» button will restart the task from the beginning if you want to redo it.
basic_training_chapter1_training_menu_me: This button lets you return to the main training menu.
basic_training_chapter1_sounds_music_mes: You can turn off sounds and music.
basic_training_chapter1_pet_shop_message: Click it to open the trading window.
basic_training_chapter1_shop_window_mess: Here you can buy and sell kittens. For example, the black kitten costs here
basic_training_chapter1_price_comparison: There are several pet shops in the game. To view prices in another shop, click the highlighted button.
If you do not see it, try collapsing this notification.
basic_training_chapter1_neighbor_shop_me: . This shop sells kittens at the lowest price.
basic_training_chapter1_opportunities_me: You can buy several kittens at once. Place two kittens in the deal area: drag a kitten into the deal area or double-click it.
basic_training_chapter1_buying_kitten_me: , let’s try to increase their number to
. But first remove one kitten from the deal. Drag one kitten back to the shop showcase.
basic_training_chapter1_approve_deal_mes: Now approve the deal by clicking the «Send» button.
basic_training_chapter1_proposal_sent_me: A message has been sent to the pet shop «Striped» saying you want to buy a kitten. You now see a purple envelope. This is how your outgoing proposals to pet shops look.
basic_training_chapter1_envelope_kitten_: If you receive a kitten as a result of a deal, a kitten will be shown on the envelope.
basic_training_chapter1_received_answer_: A green envelope means good news. Pet shops use it to agree to sell a kitten to you or buy a kitten from you. Click the envelope to read the message.
basic_training_chapter1_calculator_messa: , and you spent them on a kitten. The calculator recorded these actions.
basic_training_chapter1_now_you_have_mes: Next to the kitten you see the number
basic_training_chapter1_cat_bought_sell_: You need to sell the kitten for a high price. To check prices in another shop, click the highlighted button.
basic_training_chapter1_send_proposal_me: Click the «Send» button to send a proposal to the pet shop.
basic_training_chapter1_proposal_sent_2_: A proposal has been sent to the pet shop «BONIFACE».
basic_training_chapter1_envelope_coin_me: If you receive coins as a result of a deal, the envelope will show a coin.
basic_training_chapter1_received_answer_: The shop has replied. Click the envelope to find out if they bought your kitten.
basic_training_chapter1_analyze_solution: . WE COMPARED PRICES IN TWO SHOPS AND BOUGHT THE KITTEN AT THE LOWEST PRICE — IN THE SHOP

basic_training_chapter1_task_message_end: . In the first deal, buy kittens at the lowest price. In the second deal, sell them to the pet shop offering the highest price.
basic_training_chapter1_task_think: Think carefully and calculate everything precisely.
basic_training_chapter1_task_remember: Remember — your goal is to make a profit!
basic_training_chapter1_wrong_message: The task was not completed. Try to earn
basic_training_chapter1_wrong_message_en: in two actions. First buy, then sell.
